alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 30 at 1:43PM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Lowest amounts expected along the ND/SD border. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell, Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
